title: Task 1: Turning on the machine and retracting the filament.

steps.text: 1. Turn ON the 3D Printer at the backside of the by clicking on the button on the backside of the printer.
3. Select the slider icon to open the tuning menu.
5. Press the Retract option to retract any leftover filament from the nozzle.
6. Remove any leftover filament from the print bed.
Load the model onto the SD card.
steps.hint: Use slicing software to export a .gcode file.

steps.text: Insert the SD card into the printer.
steps.hint: Make sure it's fully inserted and recognized.

steps.text: Select the file and begin printing.
steps.hint: Navigate the menu with the knob to choose your file.
Wait at least 5â€“10 minutes to avoid warping.
Use the provided scraper to avoid damaging the plate.
Flip the power switch to the off position.
